column1: Explain how attention mechanisms improve sequence modeling in neural networks.
Describe how transformers differ from recurrent neural networks (RNNs).
What are the main advantages of self-supervised learning?
Discuss how large language models are fine-tuned for specific domains.
Explain the concept of model distillation and why it is useful.
How can synthetic data generation help address data scarcity in AI training?
Compare gradient descent variants such as SGD, Adam, and RMSProp.
Explain the purpose of activation functions in deep learning models.
What are the challenges of interpretability in deep reinforcement learning?
Describe how adversarial attacks can manipulate AI model predictions.
